content: THAT'S A WRAP! UAE HAS LEVELLED THE SERIES! On a length around off, Haider Ali cuts this towards sweeper cover and comes back for two but the keeper removes the bails and looks confident. The on-field umpire has sent this upstairs. The replay shows that Haider Ali has managed to scramble two runs, and after a brief hesitation, the TV umpire's review confirmed that he had grounded his bat in time. The call on the big screen read NOT OUT, sparking jubilant celebrations among the UAE players. With this nail-biting win, UAE have defeated Bangladesh in a T20I for the first time, keeping the series alive.

NO BALL! OH DEAR ME, Tanzim Hasan Sakib, WHAT HAVE YOU DONE? A booming beamer wide outside off, Haider Ali looks to cut this towards the point region but misses. The keeper throws it towards Tanzim and he attempts a run out at the non-striker's end but Haider Ali makes his ground just in time.
Good length on off, Matiullah Khan pushes this towards the off side and takes a single.

OUT! TIMBER! You miss, I hit. This game is swinging like a pendulum. Slower one, in the line of stumps, Dhruv Parashar clears his front leg and swings for glory but misses out. The ball goes past the batter and rattles the timber.
Dhruv Parashar b TH Sakib 11 (7b 1x4 1x6)

SIX! A massive hit in the context of the chase and this series. Back of a length on middle and leg, Dhruv Parashar clears his front leg and has pulled this over the fence towards the deep mid-wicket region for a huge six. Just 4 needed off the last 4 deliveries.
Good length on off, Haider Ali and punches this away for a single.
WIDE! On a length wide down the leg, Haider Ali leaves it. Wided.

COMICAL! 5 runs and what a brainfade moment from Shoriful Islam. On a length around middle and leg, Haider Ali thumps this towards the left of the bowler for a single. Shoriful Islam, for some reason, had a go at the stumps toward the non-striker's end but misses. A poor backup and the ball has ended up crashing into the fence.

SIX! A biggie from the bat of Haider and the chase is well and truly on. Short-pitched, on off, Haider Ali moves to his leg and cuts this over backward point and the ball has sailed over the fence for a huge six.
Good length on middle and leg, Dhruv Parashar slogs this all along the ground through mid-wicket for a single.
FOUR! A much-needed boundary for UAE. Short-pitched, around middle and leg, Dhruv Parashar pulls this over mid-wicket and the ball has raced to the fence for four. UAE now needs 24 off 9.
Short-pitched around middle and leg, Haider Ali drops this towards mid-wicket and takes one.

OUT! ANOTHER ONE BITES THE DUST! The UAE chase has derailed and what looked like an easy chase has turned into an uphill task for UAE. Pitched-up on off, Alishan Sharafu dances down the track and goes over cover but ends up finding Tawhid Hridoy at deep extra cover for a simple catch.
Alishan Sharafu c T Hridoy b S Islam 13 (9b 2x4 0x6)
Yorker, just wide of off, Dhruv Parashar has no answer to it yet again. An excellent over from Nahid Rana as he gives away just 6 and takes a wicket too.
Another one pitched short around off, Dhruv Parashar moves to his leg and looks to cut this towards point but misses out.
Bumper, around off. Dhruv Parashar goes for the pull and gets beaten by the raw pace of Nahid Rana.

OUT! CAUGHT AND BOWLED! Pace does the trick again. Short-pitched, around middle and off, Aryansh Sharma looks for the pull but gets late onto it. The ball hangs over Rana on his follow through and he takes a regulation catch to get his second of the night.
Aryansh Sharma (wk) c&b N Rana 7 (4b 0x4 1x6)
Good length wide of off, Aryansh Sharma slashes hard at it but misses.

SIX! THIS IS GIGANTIC! Back of a length on the pads, Aryansh Sharma goes for the flick but gets a top edge and the ball has landed on the roof of the fence behind the keeper for a huge six. The pace of Rana was a big factor in taking this over the rope and almost out of the park.
Short of a length around off, Aryansh Sharma rocks back and rolls this to long on for a single.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Saghir Khan departs as Tawhid Hridoy takes a good catch under pressure. Tossed up, wide outside off, Saghir Khan lofts this towards the long off region, expecting to clear Tawhid Hridoy stationed at the fence. Tawhid Hridoy settles underneath this miscued stroke and takes it nice and easy.
Saghir Khan c T Hridoy b R Hossain 8 (3b 0x4 1x6)
SIX! DISPATCHED! Tossed up on middle and leg, Saghir Khan moves to his leg and slogs this way behind the rope towards the deep mid-wicket for a massive six.
Tossed up on off, Alishan Sharafu drives this to sweeper cover for a single.
Floated on off, Alishan Sharafu drives tihs to extra cover for no run.
Tossed up wide of off, Alishan Sharafu edges this beyond backward point for a couple.

DROPPED! The skipper of Bangladesh has dropped Saghir Khan. On a length around off, it shoots up a bit on the batter. Saghir Khan looks to loft this over cover but balloons this over Das at point. Das got two other fielders in his peripheral vision and ended up dropping it. A couple taken.
WIDE! Bumper, way too high over the batter's head. Saghir Khan swings but the ball was way over his head. Wided.

OUT! CAUGHT AND BOWLED! Pace does the trick for Nahid Rana and Bangladesh. Short-pitched, around middle and leg, Asif Khan gets hurried on. Asif persists with the pull but the ball spoons off the sticker off his bat and hangs straight over Nahid Rana for a simple catch.
Asif Khan c&b N Rana 19 (12b 0x4 2x6)
Short and wide outside off, Alishan Sharafu cuts this to deep third for a single.

FOUR! Alishan Sharafu has walked out with the intent that was needed for UAE to go for the chase. On a length around off, Alishan Sharafu walks down the track and smashes this through cover for four runs.

FOUR! This is some stroke from Alishan Sharafu. Short-pitched, around off, Alishan Sharafu plays this late and just opens the face of his bat and guides this wide towards the third man region for a boundary.
On a length wide of off, Alishan Sharafu slashes hard at it but misses.
Length ball on middle, Alishan Sharafu turns it to deep square leg for a single. Productive over for Bangladesh.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! The big wicket of Waseem! Is that the turning point in the game? Shoriful Islam jumps in the air, he knows the value of this wicket. Full and outside off, another slower ball definitely. Waseem is through his shot, swings across but edges it to the keeper, Ali who dives to his right and takes it brilliantly.
Muhammad Waseem (c) c J Ali b S Islam 82 (42b 9x4 5x6)
Shoriful Islam rolls his finger on this one and deceives the batter with a slower one on off. Waseem tucks it to mid-wicket.
On a nagging length and on leg, Khan whips it behind square leg for a single.
Shoriful Islam goes short and on middle and off. Khan looks to pull it but misses.
On a length and on the pads. Waseem plays it to short fine leg for one.
SIX! Excellent from Khan! This is even better from the previous one. Length ball, outside off. Khan shows his power as he goes back and hits it over deep extra cover for a six.
SIX! Khan joins the act now! First six for him! Too straight from Sakib, full and in the slot. Khan thumps it down the ground and it goes the distance.
Dishes out a yorker on middle, Waseem digs it out to deep mid-wicket for a single.
FOUR! Waseem moves to 80! Tanzim Hasan Sakib bowls it touch fuller and around off. Waseem opens up his body and thumps it to deep square leg for a boundary.
On a length and on middle, tight from Sakib. Khan drops it to point for a single.
A good length ball, outside off. Khan drives it through covers for a couple of runs.
FOUR! Much needed boundary! 12 runs off the over. Full and on middle, Waseem sweeps off the inner half of the blade and behind square leg for a boundary.
Sees Waseem come down the track and Islam cramps him with a fuller delivery on leg, Waseem swings across but misses and gets hit on the pads.
On middle, this is fuller. Khan backsaway and pushes it through covers for a single.
Floated full and on middle, comes with the arm. Khan stands tall and tries to heave but misses and the ball rolls past the leg pole.
On the shorter side again, on middle, Waseem hits it to deep square leg for a single.
SIX! Whatever Waseem scores from here will be salt to Bangladesh's wounds. Shorter and on off, Waseem pulls it flat over cow corner for a six.
Quicker, shorter, outside off. Khan looks to cut but misses.

DROPPED! Tawhid Hridoy spills it out. He is such a good fielder, he rarely drops! Flighted on middle, Waseem looks to go downtown but miscues it high up and to long off. It hangs in the air. Tawhid Hridoy runs across to his right, slides but fails to hold on. Big moment in the game.
Rishad Hossain bowls the googly around off. Khan chops it to point for a single.
Flatter delivery, outside off, Waseem cuts it to deep point for a single.
Full and on middle, Khan flicks it to long on for a single.

OUT! TAKEN! The dangerman, Rahul Chopra goes for just 2. Rishad Hossain bowls it quick, flat and on middle and leg. Chopra goes back and tries to pull but edges it up to short fine leg where Nahid Rana takes a dolly. Two wickets in quick succession for Bangladesh.
Rahul Chopra c N Rana b R Hossain 2 (4b 0x4 0x6)
Tossed up on middle, Chopra flicks it to deep square leg for a single.
An arm ball, full and on middle, Chopra leans to defend but instead chips it right in front of Tanvir Islam.
Slightly short and on middle, Waseem pulls it to long on for a single.
Drops it short and outside off, Waseem cuts it but straight to point.
Flat and outside off. Chopra punches it to point for a single.

OUT! TAKEN! How many times have you seen a wicket right after the drinks break! Tossed up, outside off. Zohaib slashes his blade but slices his shot to deep point where the fielder takes it. A much needed breakthrough at a crucial point. Bangladesh need to build on this now.
Muhammad Zohaib c S Hossain b T Islam 38 (34b 3x4 2x6)
Short and wide of off, Muhammad Zohaib cuts this towards deep third for a single.
Darted on the pads, Waseem tucks this to long on for one.
Short of a length around middle and leg, Muhammad Zohaib pulls this towards deep mid-wicket region for a single.
Floated around off, Muhammad Waseem cuts this towards point for one.
SIX! SLOGGED AWAY FOR A GIGANTIC SIX! Tossed up on off, Muhammad Waseem clears his front leg and he has launched this out of the park over long on for a huge six.
Pushed away in the gap for a single to bring Waseem back on strike.

FOUR! Third boundary of this over and the game has shifted in favor of UAE with this solid opening partnership that's looking unstoppable at this point. Back of a length around off, Muhammad Waseem cuts this over point for a boundary to end this over.

FOUR! FIFTY FOR WASEEM! On a length around off, Muhammad Waseem clears his front leg and smashes this up and over the bowler and towards the long off region for a boundary. Waseem means business tonight.
Short-pitched, around middle and leg, Muhammad Waseem goes for the pull but gets it chopped towards the mid-wicket region for no run.
FOUR! Back of a length on off, Muhammad Waseem gets up with the bounce and punches this through extra cover for a boundary. This is sensational hitting from these two UAE openers.
Good length on off, Muhammad Zohaib cuts this through point for one.

Short-pitched, around middle and leg, Muhammad Waseem goes for the pull but doesn't get it out of the middle of his bat. It helps Waseem as the ball does not travel to the fielder at deep square and the batters take one.
Pushed through on off, Muhammad Waseem pushes this through cover for a single.
Fuller one on the pads, Zohaib this time flicks this towards deep mid-wicket for a single.
Darted on the pads, Muhammad Zohaib yet again attempts for a flick and misses.
Pushed through on the pads, Muhammad Zohaib goes for the flick but misses and gets rocked on his pads.
Short of a length around off, Muhammad Waseem cuts this to deep point for a single.
LEG BYE! Tossed up on the pads, Muhammad Zohaib goes for the flick but misses. Clips this off his pads toward fine leg for one.
Darted into the pads, Muhammad Waseem looks to slog this out of the park but misses and gets hit on his wrist.

SIX! SLOGGED AWAY FOR A HUGE SIX! Tossed up outside off, Muhammad Waseem goes down on a knee and slogs this up and over the cow corner fence for a biggie. Waseem and Zohaib have got UAE off to a flying start.
Fired on the pads, around leg. Muhammad Waseem goes for the flick but misses and wears it on the pads.
Quicker one wide outside off, Muhammad Zohaib cuts this towards short third for a single.
Floated wide of off, Zohaib cuts this through short third for a couple.
Short and wide outside off, Muhammad Waseem cuts this to deep point for a single.
FOUR! An excellent end to the Powerplay for UAE. Pitched up around off, Muhammad Zohaib strides to the pitch of it and drives this all along the ground through cover for four.
On a length around middle and leg, Muhammad Zohaib flicks this to mid-wicket for no run.
Short-pitched, around middle and off. Muhammad Zohaib sways away from it.
On a length around middle and leg, Muhammad Waseem flicks this towards deep mid-wicket for a single.
SIX! HIGH AND HANDSOME! Back of a length, around off, Muhammad Waseem was waiting for it with a high backlift and he pulls this beyond the ropes toward the deep mid-wicket region for a huge six.
Back of a length on off, Muhammad Zohaib pushes this towards cover-point for a single.
A couple of dots to end but 18 runs off the over. Full and on middle, Waseem clips it to mid-wicket.
Good length ball, around off, shapes in. Waseem looks to punch but splices it to point.
FOUR! This is so, so good from Waseem! Bangs it short and on middle, something to pull but instead Waseem cuts it through point for a boundary. Excellent so far from the skipper.
FOUR! 14 runs of half the over! Well played! Short in length and slanting on middle, Waseem gets tall, makes a bit of room and slaps it somehow past point for a boundary.
Wide! Not a good debut over so far! Full and going down the leg side. Waseem looks to paddle it away but misses.
Generates some extra bounce as Rana bowls into the surface, outside off. Waseem swings and misses.
Drops it short and on middle, Zohaib looks to pull but gets a top edge to square leg where the catch is taken. Just one off the free hit delivery.
NO BALL AND SIX! Again, poor quality of delivery! A full toss around the waist. Zohaib whacks it over square leg and it goes the distance.
No ball! Not the start Rana would have hoped for. Goes for the bumper into the surface but errs it completely and bowls well outside off, Zohaib leaves. Free hit next...
Outside off, Zohaib guides it to point for a single.
SIX! Off the sweet spot! This time Zohaib judges the length properly as he hangs back and hoicks this short ball over mid-wicket for a six.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib mixes his line and length, goes short and outside off, Zohaib looks to pull but misses.
Cuts out the width and bowls it close to the off pole. Zohaib defends it on the off side.
FOUR! Carved away! This is full and outside off, width on offer and Muhammad Zohaib hits it over backward point for a boundary.
Leg bye! Tanzim Hasan Sakib pushes it full and on the pads. Waseem looks to clip but misses and gets hit on the pads. It rolls away for a leg bye.
Lovely over from Islam! Targets the pads with a hard length delivery. Zohaib looks to clip but misses and gets hit on the pads.
A gentle full toss dipping onto the batter, this is on off, driven to covers.
Wide! Bangs it short and on middle, Zohaib looks to pull but misses. Good take from the keeper who gets a hand on it and stops.
Goes full and into the blockhole. Waseem whips it to deep square leg for a single

FOUR! PULLED AWAY! Muhammad Waseem looks so good when he is on song. Short of a length and on middle, Waseem stands tall and pulls it through mid-wicket. The fielder gives a chase, dives but to no avail.
Short in length and outside off, Zohaib taps it to third man for a single.
BEATEN! Islam serves it full and outside off, swings away. Zohaib looks to drive but misses. WIDED.
A good length ball on middle, holds its line. Zohaib hops and blocks it out.
SIX! Almost out of the ground. In the slot, full and on middle, Waseem powers it over long on and it goes the distance. 12 runs off the over. The skipper has started well.
Serves it full and shaping on middle, Zohaib skips down and swings across to hit it to square leg for a single.
Tossed up full and around off, Zohaib punches it to cover.

A better throw was needed from such a short distance. Flat and around off, Waseem makes room and chops it in front of cover. The batters take a risky single but Litton Das spills it wide to the keeper. One run.
The arm ball, full and on middle, Waseem prods and blocks it out.
FOUR! He just loves to play the spinners. Tanvir Islam starts with a short one on middle, Waseem goes back and pulls it over mid-wicket for a boundary.
An inswinging full ball on middle, Waseem flicks it to deep mid-wicket for a single. The skipper is underway.
Angles this one on the pads. Zohaib clips it behind square leg for a single.
BEATEN! Shoriful Islam goes a bit full and outside off, shapes away late. Zohaib has a poke at it but misses.
This one tails back in, tad short and angling on leg, Zohaib looks to flick but misses and gets hit on the pads.
On a good length and outside off, swings away. Muhammad Zohaib throws his bat at it but misses.

FOUR! BIG CHANCE! Najmul Hossain Shanto mistimed his jump at first slip! Short in length and outside off, shapes away late. Zohaib looks to cut but outside edges it to first slip where Najmul Hossain Shanto palms it over to the third man fence.
This is full and outside off, Shamim Hossain drives it to long off for a single. Excellent over. Bangladesh though end with 205/5.
Well bowled! Top over so far! Serves it short and outside off, extra bounce. Shamim Hossain looks to pull but bottom edges it onto the surface.
Saghir Khan digs in short and on middle and leg, Rishad Hossain pulls it behind square leg for one.
Not where he intended but gets a run. Slower one outside off. Shamim Hossain looks to reverse hit but miscues his shot to fine leg for a single.
Short of a length and on middle, Rishad Hossain pulls it to deep square leg for a single.

OUT! GONE! Tawhid Hridoy goes now! This wicket could make a big difference. Serves it full and on middle, probably the slower one. Hridoy skies his shot to mid-wicket. Saghir Khan calls, runs across and takes a well judged catch.
Tawhid Hridoy c&b S Khan 45 (24b 3x4 2x6)
So, 20 runs off the over. Length ball, on top of off. Hossain punches it to cover.
FOUR! 200 up for the Bangla Tigers! Shorter and angling on leg, Hossain pulls it behind square leg for a boundary. Huge over for Bangladesh.

OUT! TAKEN! Change in line brings some reward! Muhammad Jawadullah bowls full and outside off, very full and Ali fails to dig it out cleanly. Balloons it to extra cover where Rahul Chopra holds onto it. Jaker Ali has played his part. A quick cameo from him.
Jaker Ali (wk) c R Chopra b M Jawadullah 18 (6b 1x4 2x6)
SIX! It feels as if Ali knows where the ball will land. Short in length and on middle, Ali holds his ground and pulls it over cow corner for a six.16 runs already...
FOUR! Fantastic shot! Good length ball, outside off, Ali slaps it through covers and it races away. No chance for the man at deep point.
SIX! Pressure on Muhammad Jawadullah straightaway! Short of a length and on middle, Ali steps across, inside the line and pulls it over square leg for a six.
A slower bumper around off, Ali looks to pull but gets a bottom edge onto the pads. It rolls away for a single.
Drops it short and on middle, Hridoy pulls it to deep square leg for a single.
FOUR! MORE RUNS! Well played actually. Full and outside off, Hridoy opens the face of the bat and dabs it past third man for four more.
FOUR! Punished! Short in length and angling on middle and leg. Hridoy pulls it to deep square leg where it lands just in front of the ropes.
Shorter and outside off, Hridoy upper cuts it to third man for a couple of runs. Good running.

That was a tough call for the third umpire! Tough and go! Full and on middle, Hridoy hits it high up and to deep mid-wicket where the fielder takes it. He throws at the bowler's end where the bowler clips the bails off. The replay shows Jaker Ali almost dragged his bat in to make his end.
Wide! Free-hit continues! Shorter and well wide outside off. Hridoy slashes and misses.
No ball! That one slipped out! A full toss down leg, over the head and Hridoy swings across the line but misses. Easy call for the umpire. FREE-HIT NEXT....
Excellent over from Muhammad Jawadullah! Just what his team needed! On a length and on middle, Hridoy turns it to mid-wicket for one.
This is full and on middle, Ali flicks it to square leg for a single. He is underway.

OUT! TAKEN! Muhammad Jawadullah gets his second wicket. Turning out to be a really good over. Hard length delivery, outside off, was the slower one. Shanto flashes his blade but slices his shot to deep cover where Dhruv Parashar holds onto it.
Najmul Hossain Shanto c D Parashar b M Jawadullah 27 (19b 2x4 1x6)
Wide! Too short on this occasion on leg, Shanto looks to pull but misses.
Good start to the over! Keeps it short and outside off. Hridoy ramps it to third man for one.
Bangs it short and on middle, Shanto pulls it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
WELL BOWLED! A well-deceived short delivery into the surface, outside off. Shanto flashes his blade and misses.
Very full and outside off, Hridoy drives it to long off for a couple of runs.
Serves it full and way outside off, Hridoy punches it right back to the bowler.
SIX! Too easy for Hridoy at the moment. Short of a good length and on middle, Hridoy launches it over long on for a biggie.
FOUR! 150 up for the visitors! Bowls it in the slot, full and on middle, Hridoy whips it to deep square leg for a boundary.

Miscommunication and it falls safely! A good length ball on middle, Hridoy swings across the line and hits it to deep mid-wicket. The man from mid-wicket leaves it for the fielder running in from long on but it falls safely.
Muhammad Waseem bowls a full toss, outside off. Shanto hits it down to long off for a single.
SIX! SLOGGED AWAY FOR A HUGE SIX! Tossed up on off, Tawhid Hridoy clears his front foot and slogs this up and over the long on fielder for a huge six to spoil a tidy over.
Darted in the line of stumps, Najmul rolls this to long on for one.
Low full toss on off, Tawhid Hridoy slices this to deep third for one.
Quicker and fuller around off, Tawhid Hridoy cuts this towards point for no run.
Fired in the line of stumps, Najmul Hossain Shanto drills this to long on for a single.
Pushed through on off, Tawhid Hridoy dabs this towards short third and takes one.
On a length around middle and off, Tawhid Hridoy flicks this to long on for a single.
Slower one, short and wide outside off, Tawhid Hridoy cuts this to deep third's left for a couple.
Goes full again and in the line of stumps, Tawhid Hridoy flicks this towards deep mid-wicket region for a couple.
Full on off, Shanto drills this to long off for a single.
Wide yorker outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto leaves it.
On a length around middle and leg, Tawhid Hridoy flicks this towards the deep square leg region for a single.
A single to end the over as Tawhid Hridoy guides this to third man region.
Slower one, back of a length around leg. Najmul Hossain Shanto slaps this to long on for one.
On a length around the pads, Tawhid Hridoy flicks this towards mid-wicket for a single.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Slower one, back of a length into the body of Das. The skipper of Bangladesh goes for the pull but doesn't get enough power behind it. The ball has travelled straight to the fielder in the deep at deep mid-wicket for a regulation catch.
Litton Das (c) c S Khan b M Jawadullah 40 (32b 3x4 1x6)
On a length way too wide of off, Najmul Hossain Shanto reaches it and pushes this to point for one.
Short-pitched, around middle and leg, Litton Das gets hurried into the pull and gets it away off the sticker on his bat for a single towards square leg region.
On a length, around off, Litton Das lofts this on the bounce towards long off for a single. This almost carried to the fielder.
Back of a length around off, Litton Das cuts this over short third and runs a couple.
Good length on the pads, Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to flick this towards leg but misses and gets an inside edge on the pads and deflects it towards off for no run.
FOUR! Pitched up around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets on top of the bounce and lofts this over cover for four runs.
FOUR! Boundaries are being hit at will. Good length on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto hops up with the bounce and punches this through extra cover for a boundary.
Back of a length on off, Litton Das chips this over cover for a single.
Tossed up on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto drives this towards deep extra cover for a couple.
Full on off, Litton Das pushes this to long off for one.
FOUR! Cut away for a boundary this time. Short and wide outside of off, Litton Das plays this late and cuts this through the gap between short third and backward point for four.
Short of a length around off, Litton Das cuts this towards deep point for a couple.
Too full on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto rolls this to long on for a single.

SIX! Right out of the middle of his bat. Hanging full toss, around leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto clears his front leg and slogs this beyond the rope towards the cow corner for a huge six to bring up the team 100 in just over 10 overs.
A couple of overs without a boundary. United Arab Emirates building some momentum. Outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto guides it to point for one.
A hard length delivery on middle, Das nudges it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Short of a good length and outside off. Das slashes his blade hard but misses.
Wide! That was awkward from both parties! A juicy full toss, slanting on leg and dipping on its way. Das ducks and lets it go behind his back.
Tails in a yorker on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto digs it out to the right of mid off for a quick single. He is off the mark.
A good length delivery, outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to cut but misses.

OUT! GONE! Saghir Khan gets the breakthrough! Tanzid Hasan was without a strike for a long time and might have lost his momentum. Saghir Khan sticks to his strength, bowls into the surface on middle, Hasan pulls it to deep square leg where Matiullah Khan gets low and takes it. Can United Arab Emirates build on this?
Tanzid Hasan c M Khan b S Khan 59 (33b 8x4 3x6)
Was that a chance? Dhruv Parashar's reaction says a lot! Full and on off, Das leans and drives it aerially and back to Dhruv Parashar.
Flighted full and outside off, Das splices his drive to short third man.
A huge shout for LBW but turned down. Quicker, fuller and comes with the angle on leg, Das looks to slog-sweep but misses and gets hit on the pads. Going down.
Serves it full and outside off, Das punches it to the right of cover. The fielder dives and instead parries it away from the man at long off for a couple more.
Full and on middle, Hasan flicks it to deep mid-wicket for a single.

Dhruv Parashar flirts with the tramline again, well outside off. Das bends low and lofts it to deep point. Oh, a mix up in the middle but the fielder throws at the wrong end. A better throw at the bowler's end and Litton Das was a goner. He was almost more than halfway down but gets back with a dive.
Wide! Strats with a widish one, well outside off, it is left alone.
FOUR! Saghir Khan with a pre-meditated line and length, into the surface on off. Hasan throws his body back and slams it over long off for a one-bounce four. 12 runs off the over.
Short of a length and outside off, bumped into the ground. Das punches it to extra cover for a single.

SIX! Das nails this one! He was watching the show from the other end so far but feels it's time for his contribution now. Short of a length and outside off, Das pulls it flat and over deep square leg for a biggie.
Leg bye! Serves it full and shaping on the pads. Hasan steps across to flick but misses and gets hit on the pads. A stifled appeal follows for LBW but that was easily going down.
Hits the deck hard and bowls into the surface, this is on off. Hasan mistimes his pull back onto the deck.
Saghir Khan starts with a shorter delivery on middle, Das is cramped as he pulls, it goes to deep square leg for a single.
IN THE AIR...In the gap for one! Drops it short and on middle, Das goes back and pulls off the outer half of the bat to deep square leg, falls right between the two players in the deep.
Tossed up full and on middle, Hasan eases it to long on for a single.
Dhruv Parashar loops this one full and around off, Das works with the angle to deep square leg for one.
Changes the line and goes well outside off, this is fuller. Das plays it wide of long off for a couple more.
Bowls it quicker, fuller and on middle, Das turns it to mid-wicket.
Slightly short and around off, Hasan knocks it to long on and rotates the strike.
This is full and on middle, Hasan drills it down to long on for a single. Bangladesh end the Powerplay on a high note. 12 runs off the over. 66/0 at the end of the sixth over.

SIX! Poor ball and punished! FIFTY FOR HASAN IN JUST 25 BALLS! Superb knock so far! A A full toss on middle, Hasan gets on his knee and slogs it over square leg for a biggie. Just the rise of the bat. He is eyeing more today.
FOUR! A boundary in this over too! Too easy for the left-handed Hasan. Very full and around off, Hasan lofts it cleanly over mid off and it races to the fence.
A bit too full on this occasion, this is around off. Das digs it out in front of the man at cover for a single.
Well bowled! Floats it full and angles it on off, it lands and spins away sharply. Das shapes for the conventional sweep but misses.
Flat and around off, into the surface. Das makes room and cuts but straight to cover.
A dot to end the over. Good length on off, Tanzid Hasan pushes this towards mid off for no run.
WIDE! Back of a length, down the leg. Tanzid Hasan goes for the flick but misses. Wided.
FOUR! Using the pace to good effect is Tanzid. Full and wide outside off, Tanzid Hasan opesn the face of his bat and just helps this through backward point region for a boundary.
Good length wide outside off, Tanzid Hasan gives it a good look and leaves it all alone.
SIX! Bread and butter stuff for Tanzid Hasan. Back of a length around the hips of Tanzid and he has picked this up with a flick and deposited it over the ropes toward the deep square leg region.
On a length around off, Tanzid Hasan shimmies down the track and thumps this towards cover for no run.
FOUR! Width on offer and Tanzid pounces onto it. Back of a length wide outside off, allowing Tanzid Hasan to free his arms. Tanzid slashes hard at it and cuts this through point for a boundary.
Full toss on off, Tanzid Hasan backs away and hammers this to the left of Waseem at mid off. The skipper of UAE puts in a dive and restricts this to a single.
Pushed through on off, Tanzid Hasan manages to bring his bat down barely in time and blocks this out.
Short of a length around middle and off, Litton Das rocks back and punches this towards cover-point but a fumble from Saghir Khan allows the single.
Too full, on the pads, Tanzid Hasan rolls this to long on for one.

Too full on off, Tanzid Hasan drills this towards mid off and takes a few steps before sending back Litton Das on the other end. Das was struggling but a poor throw from Muhammad Waseem towards the bowler's end saves Das again.
Full and on off, Tanzid Hasan hits this uppish but short of Muhammad Waseem at mid off for no run.

DROPPED! An early lifeline for Litton Das as he has been dropped on 10 by Muhammad Jawadullah. Touch quicker and on the pads, Litton Das flicks this and hits this too well. The ball travels towards the fielder at the ring on short fine but Muhammad Jawadullah makes a mess of it and drops it.
FOUR! Another boundary from the bat of Das. Fuller wide outside the off-stump. Litton Das moves a bit to his leg and drives this through the gap between mid off and extra cover for four runs.
Das goes for a sweep on a fuller delivery down the leg, ends up toe-poking it towards square leg for no run.
FOUR! Litton Das gets into the act now. Tossed up wide of off, Litton Das shuffles to his leg and opens up the off side. Lofts this over extra cover and the ball has raced to the fence for four.
Much quicker, flatter, around the pads, Tanzid Hasan tucks this to deep mid-wicket for a single.
FOUR! Dhruv is greeted with a boundary. Tossed up on off, Tanzid Hasan presents a full face of his bat and lofts this over mid off for a boundary. Pressure straightway on Dhruv Parashar.
A single to end the over. Too full on the pads, Tanzid Hasan drills this towards long on and takes a single.
Fuller on the pads, Tanzid Hasan flicks this towards square leg and takes a single.
Tossed up, on off, Tanzid Hasan thumps this on the bounce towards point for another dot.
Fires one on off, Tanzid Hasan ams this towards the off side for a dot.
FOUR! Tanzid is dealing in boundaries. Short of a length around middle and leg, Tanzid Hasan pulls this towards the right of deep square and gets a boundary.
Slower through the air, on off. Litton Das drops this in front of cover-point and takes a single.

FOUR! Another boundary to end the over. 17 off the very first over of this contest. On a length around off, Tanzid Hasan strides to the pitch of the ball and lofts this over mid off for a boundary to end the over.
FOUR! A thumping boundary this time. Pitched-up around middle and leg, Tanzid Hasan jumps down the track and lofts this behind the bowler for a boundary towards the sight screen.

SIX! Deposited into the stands. Short-pitched, on middle and off, Tanzid Hasan stands still and swings through the line. Pulls this right out of the middle of his bat and deposits this into the stand towards deep mid-wicket for a huge six.
Good length on middle and leg, Litton Das gently glances this towards mid on and takes a single.
On a length around off, Tanzid Hasan drives this to deep point for a single.

DRAMA! Matiullah Khan goes full and attacks the pads of Tanzid Hasan. The left-handed batter looks for the flick but misses. The ball did deflect off something and the keeper catches this behind the stumps with the fielding side in celebratory mode but the umpire keeps his finger down.
WIDE! An extra to get us underway. Good length, wide outside the tramline on off. Tanvir Islam shoulders arms it. Wided.
